title: New: MYTHHS – Lost
body: Reading’s **MYTHHS** show a bolder, more confident edge on their second track, _Lost_. Again utilising the rather splendid vocals of lead singer Martha Roper, Lost is a tumultuous number, yet with enough of a ‘pop’ vibe to it to inevitably find them turning industry heads. Check it below and their debut track, [Elements here](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/28006-new-mythhs-elements). LOST by MYTHHS
